name: Adore You
content: All my life I just started living
我想要生活，我刚开始觉得我活着
When you say you love me
And when you say you need me
When I'm crying out for you
当我迫切需要你的时候
我感到我有勇气站起来了
When you say you love me
And when you say you need me
I love lying next to you
I could do this for eternity
当上天把你带给我，我切切实实地拥有了你
When you say you love me
And when you say you need me
When you say you love me
And when you say you need me
